uni

Class Group

  • java.lang.Object
    • uni.Group
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGroup

    public class Group
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGroup
    A group is set of students, who have something in common.

    The Group is a list of objects from Studentclass. There are operations, that can be applied to all of these objects.

    See Also:
    Student

      • addStudent

        public boolean addStudent(Student s)
        Adds student to a group. If object trying to be added is already a member of a group, it gets rejected.

        After student is added, group is sorted.

        Specified by:
        addStudent in interface IGroup
        Parameters:
        s - Student who joins the group.
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • studentAt

        public Student studentAt(int index)
        Looks for the Student based on ones index number.

        Checks if the group contains a student with given index number. If there is, returns the student. If there is no such student returns null.

        Specified by:
        studentAt in interface IGroup
        Parameters:
        index - Index number given.
        Returns:
        null if there is no matching student or Student object matching given index number.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        s - Student who is checked.
        Returns:
        true if one is contained

      • evaluateStudent

        public void evaluateStudent(Student s)
        Given student is evaluated.

        Based on normal distribution, student gets a grade, from 2 to 5.

        Specified by:
        evaluateStudent in interface IGroup
        Parameters:
        s - Evaluated student.
        See Also:
        Student.evaluate()

      • evaluateStudent

        public void evaluateStudent(int index)
        Given student is evaluated.

        Based on normal distribution, student gets a grade, from 2 to 5.

        Specified by:
        evaluateStudent in interface IGroup
        Parameters:
        index - Evaluated student based on index number.
        See Also:
        Student.evaluate()

      • evaluateAll

        public void evaluateAll()
        All students gets evaluated.

        Based on normal distribution, every student in the group gets a grade, from 2 to 5.

        Specified by:
        evaluateAll in interface IGroup
        See Also:
        Student.evaluate()
